title: Looking for players to play ranked with flex queue or solo/duo
body:
I want to create a good team to get out of B5... As League of Legends is a huge game many people good and bad play it and the noobs in ranked are killing me I cannot get out of b5 no matter how hard I try... For example, the game in a game I just finished playing the mid laner never pinged missing and we lost (what do you expect they had a fed Zed)
Anyone who is unranked or Bronze please add me and then lets play ranked and finally get out of the void xD
I am a b5 Azir main but I play many champions and can play any role.
The champions I am good at are {{champion:268}} {{champion:202}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:21}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:61}}   these are the champions i am sure i won't play like _trash_ and these are the champions I am level 5+ (there are other champions i am lvl 5+ too)
The champions i hate are {{champion:122}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:240}} {{champion:142}} 
I get tilted if anyone makes stupid mistakes like not backing when they are low or not pinging.
There is one last thing I need to tell you, please forget it after reading. please pleaseeeeee PLEASEEEEEEE do not pay much attention to my username {{sticker:sg-ahri-1}} 

Have a good day.

replies.body: What rank do you think you are performing at?

> [{quoted}](name=MysticLlamaZ,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=1ZqHYTnn,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-04T21:08:28.742+0000)
>
> What rank do you think you are performing at?

I am not sure I never saw Gold or above play but I think I can easily get to silver with nice teams.

The golden tip on climbing: 
This is it....
The only tip that matters....
DONT BLAME TEAMATES, BLAME YOURSELF. Once you accept this and transcend beyond this realm you will climb.

> [{quoted}](name=MysticLlamaZ,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=1ZqHYTnn,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2017-12-05T05:36:17.759+0000)
>
> The golden tip on climbing: 
> This is it....
> The only tip that matters....
> DONT BLAME TEAMATES, BLAME YOURSELF. Once you accept this and transcend beyond this realm you will climb.

i transcended beyond this realm went everywhere {{champion:136}} {{champion:142}} and{{champion:516}} have been i even went into the void and came back fine... xD
I would like to know this too. Most Bronze V's think they're better, but the majority of them play around a Bronze IV, V, or worse level (granted there are exceptions, but these are a rarity).
@MysticLlamaZ and @Higumi well I once got 4 S in a row with different champions and also I got 2 S in a row with {{champion:202}}  earlier today so I think I am pretty good.
You got S in bronze 5 elo tho

> [{quoted}](name=MysticLlamaZ,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=1ZqHYTnn,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-12-05T05:34:52.185+0000)
>
> You got S in bronze 5 elo tho

i have 8 win streak thats pretty good... i am bronze and play with other bronze players so give me some credit bruh!
Hi i am b3 and i would be happy teaming up with you. I am a Jg main sejuani . My username is XxDEATHREAPERxX

> [{quoted}](name=XxDEATHREAPERxX,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=1ZqHYTnn,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2017-12-06T07:27:48.267+0000)
>
> Also plz answer fast!!!

sorry dude i was offline for few days.

First off, what rank do you think you deserve? Based solely on your OP.GG, I would put you around the rank you're currently at, however I can't know for certain since I have never seen you play.

Secondly, you are playing sooooooooo many champions. Just stick to a few. You say you're good with Azir, yet your match-history says otherwise (not just the 0% win-rates, but the obscenely low KDAs, ie. you're dying way too much). If you want to quickly get out of Bronze, reduce your champion pool, play 2 roles, and get rid of the mechanically difficult champions such as Azir, Yasuo and Lee Sin. I would suggest continuing with Orianna Mid since she is strong right now and perhaps also adding Annie to your pool.

Also, how do you expect to climb with barely any games played in Ranked?

As for the "Mid doesn't ping MIA", this just further proves Bronze players don't look at their map or ward. If you did, you would have seen that Zed was MIA and a ward would have spotted him roaming.

> [{quoted}](name=Hifumi,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=1ZqHYTnn,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-12-04T22:05:51.068+0000)

> First off, what rank do you think you deserve? Based solely on your OP.GG, I would put you around the rank you're currently at, however I can't know for certain since I have never seen you play.

> Secondly, you are playing sooooooooo many champions. Just stick to a few. You say you're good with Azir, yet your match-history says otherwise (not just the 0% win-rates, but the obscenely low KDAs, ie. you're dying way too much). If you want to quickly get out of Bronze, reduce your champion pool, play 2 roles, and get rid of the mechanically difficult champions such as Azir, Yasuo and Lee Sin. I would suggest continuing with Orianna Mid since she is strong right now and perhaps also adding Annie to your pool.
> 
> Also, how do you expect to climb with barely any games played in Ranked?
> 
> As for the "Mid doesn't ping MIA", this just further proves Bronze players don't look at their map or ward. If you did, you would have seen that Zed was MIA and a ward would have spotted him roaming.

I have 47.5% win rate with Azir this year, in 101 matches (Ik its a nice number xD) don't tell a Azir main to stop playing Azir I can not do that and I also play Orianna, I play many champions because I want to learn them only by playing will you truly understand their kit and playstyle.
About the ping. I actually wrote everything that happened that game and exited the browser by mistake so wrote down the short version of it.
